about_the_game: The game "Africa Help" is an open-world simulator located in the Central Africa. As a volunteer, you will face the many challenges throughout the game. Follow the path to creating a great charity by starting as a regular volunteer. It is your desicion, your choice, which path you will take. Build hospitals, wells, schools, give jobs, achieve a high level of residents' satisfaction. In addition to the story line, complete many side quests. Just read ads or talk to people, certainly many of them need your help. Their life will depend solely on you. Part of the game's proceeds will be going to charity. Create a story that starts today.
